name: Doctor Fix My Dreams Pt. 1
description:
You ever just starting having some terrifyingly weird dreams you can't parse?

Life of SATOSHI Teaser Track 2 - "Doctor Fix My Dreams, Pt. 1" is now available.

You are about to play something with which there is no real logic. That is the point.

This is the final teaser for Life of SATOSHI, a project that has been my little, weird pet for the past 10 or 11 months. You'll see lots of weird stuff and nothing's really going to make sense, but if you make it to the end of the teaser you may start to see a hint of what the actual game is going to deal with. I hope you tag along for the ride.

The game is best played with headphones. Be warned, there are loud, sudden sounds like screaming, howling, etc.

This game features explicit language.

There are instances of flashing images, so please be aware of this if you have any light sensitivity issues.

This game may feature triggering content.
